alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 11:32AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT AREAS ALONG HIGHWAY 13 BETWEEN RIO BLANCO AND MEEKER... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1131 AM MST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from 10 miles west of Meeker to 23 miles northwest of Silt to 6 miles northwest of Rifle and moving north at 70 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Meeker around 1145 AM MST. This includes the following highways... Colorado 13 between mile markers 28 and 70. Colorado 64 between mile markers 66 and 73. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
